Agent-Driven Development Workflow with Semantic Versioning
============================================================

┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                      1. ISSUE RECEIVED                          │
│  GitHub Issue assigned to Copilot Agent                         │

                       │
                       ▼

                       │
                       ▼

│  │ Breaking  │  │   New      │  │  Bug Fix    │               │

│  │    ↓      │  │    ↓       │  │     ↓       │               │
│  │  MAJOR    │  │  MINOR     │  │   PATCH     │               │
│  │  X.0.0    │  │  0.X.0     │  │   0.0.X     │               │
│  └───────────┘  └────────────┘  └─────────────┘               │
│                                                                  │
│  Current version: 1.0.0                                         │
│  Determined version: 1.0.1 (example: bug fix)                   │
└──────────────────────┬──────────────────────────────────────────┘
                       │
                       ▼
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│              4. IMPLEMENT CHANGES                               │
│                                                                  │

│  File: package.json                                             │
│  Change: "version": "1.0.0" → "version": "1.0.1"               │

                       │
                       ▼

                       │
                       ▼

Decision Matrix
===============

Change Type              → Version    Example
─────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Remove feature          → MAJOR      Delete tile type
Change game state       → MAJOR      New save format
Framework change        → MAJOR      React → Vue

Add game mode           → MINOR      Multiplayer
Add UI panel            → MINOR      Settings screen
New mechanic            → MINOR      Power-ups

Fix animation           → PATCH      Smooth transitions
Fix calculation         → PATCH      Score bug
Optimize performance    → PATCH      Faster rendering
Layout fix              → PATCH      Mobile responsive

Quick Commands
==============

# Check current version
cat package.json | grep version

# List all tags
git tag -l

# Show tag details
git show v1.0.1

# Use helper script
.github/agents/version-helper.sh patch "Description"

# Manual version bump
npm version patch   # 1.0.0 → 1.0.1
npm version minor   # 1.0.0 → 1.1.0
npm version major   # 1.0.0 → 2.0.0
